Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/Lafayette
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temp. rerouted via 75th, Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes, 75th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Lafayette, 76th, Vincennes, 75th and over regular route, due to street blockage near 75th/Lafayette.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
